## Headers() function

Set custom headers for a REST method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Headers(headersDef: {
    [key: string]: string;
}): (_target: RESTClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  headersDef | <code>{</code><br/><code>    [key: string]: string;</code><br/><code>}</code> | custom headers in a key-value pair |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(_target: RESTClient, _propertyKey: string, descriptor: any) => any`
